title: Kobacheg
author: Kobacheg
content: https://globevel.comIncrease your income from USDT staking up to 60% per annum.Global Level is an investment company that started work in 2012. At the initial stage, it was a private trade with its own funds. However, as a result of successful trading operations, accumulated experience and knowledge, it turned into a community of traders, which allowed to increase the total income and, most importantly, to ensure its stability.Global Level does not engage in high-risk trading - margin and futures, our goal is not to double the balance in a week with the risk of losing it in two days. Our task is to provide a stable income over a long distance.This is the key to our success. Now you have the opportunity to be in our ranks.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: How does this relate to gambling?And by the way, this strategy is long dead, if you must defraud people, then look for a better strategy.Delete this or move it to off topic

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: I checked your trust page and I saw how you are only here to scam, but Bitcointalk is just not a place for you to execute scam.This scam again does not work, scam is obvious to know. Code:Domain:globevel.comRegistrar:Regtime Ltd.Registered On:2022-08-08Expires On:2023-08-08Updated On:2022-08-08This is just a scam. Avoid.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: Kobacheg on November 12, 2022, 11:06:31 AMhttps://globevel.comIncrease your income from USDT staking up to 60% per annum.Global Level is an investment company that started work in 2012. At the initial stage, it was a private trade with its own funds. However, as a result of successful trading operations, accumulated experience and knowledge, it turned into a community of traders, which allowed to increase the total income and, most importantly, to ensure its stability.Global Level does not engage in high-risk trading - margin and futures, our goal is not to double the balance in a week with the risk of losing it in two days. Our task is to provide a stable income over a long distance.This is the key to our success. Now you have the opportunity to be in our ranks.I don't understand what this has to do with gambling, I understand that any investment, especially such a risky one, also has to do with excitement, but why promote scam.

comments.author: Kobacheg
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on November 12, 2022, 11:17:59 AMI checked your trust page and I saw how you are only here to scam, but Bitcointalk is just not a place for you to execute scam.This scam again does not work, scam is obvious to know. Code:Domain:globevel.comRegistrar:Regtime Ltd.Registered On:2022-08-08Expires On:2023-08-08Updated On:2022-08-08This is just a scam. Avoid. How funny such posts are. Do you think that no one else knows how to find out the age of the site?20 years ago I created my first website and there were the same smart guys in the style of "you just opened, we don't trust you". The site is still working, but not one smart guy has not apologized)

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: 60% per Annum is unrealistic, if you want to be honest, even the big exchange with huge liquidity like binance can not give such an offer on stablecoin staking and still remain in business.It will be better to be transparent and give a realistic % reward so that users are aware of what they are getting rather than giving false hope.

comments.author: Kobacheg
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on November 13, 2022, 09:23:49 AM60% per Annum is unrealistic, if you want to be honest, even the big exchange with huge liquidity like binance can not give such an offer on stablecoin staking and still remain in business.It will be better to be transparent and give a realistic % reward so that users are aware of what they are getting rather than giving false hope.Because the binance exchange does not trade with this money. They only provide a loan - this is an analogue of a bank. Therefore, the percentages are scanty, your comparison is not relevant.
